description: An easy-afternoon loop or a week under heavy loads through rugged terrain—the Basin™ Hike Pant handles them both and everything in between. This durable yet stretchy pant features a gusseted and articulated construction to improve range of motion and comfort on the move.
name: Mountain Hardwear Basin Trek Pants, Reg - Mens

specs.value: Nylon Stretch Cotton-touch Plain Weave - 94% Nylon, 6% Elastane
